name: Bhoomika
wishText: May God bless you with good peoples and friends in your life and u achive whatever u want o achieve in life.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. and hah it's not over yet u get 1 500 rupees coupon as birthday gift which will get activated just after my internship.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
